statements: SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount, biometric_data FROM biometric_payment_transactions ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payment FROM biometric_payment_transactions;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE payment_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT biometric_data, payment_amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE user_id = 300;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments_transactions WHERE customer_id = 12345;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_time FROM biometric_payments_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT biometric_id, biometric_type FROM biometric_data WHERE customer_id = 67890 ORDER BY biometric_id DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM biometric_payments_transactions WHERE transaction_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payments_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) FROM biometric_payments_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;

SELECT biometric_type, AVG(transaction_amount) FROM biometric_payments_transactions JOIN biometric_data ON biometric_payments_transactions.customer_id = biometric_data.customer_id GROUP BY biometric_type;
SELECT * FROM biometric_data WHERE biometric_type = 'fingerprint' ORDER BY biometric_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) FROM biometric_payments_transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY SUM(transaction_amount) DESC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 'abc123';
SELECT user_id, amount FROM biometric_payment_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_time DESC;
SELECT t.log_description, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM transaction_logs t JOIN users u ON t.log_id = u.user_id WHERE t.log_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY t.log_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_id, log_description FROM biometric_payment_transactions AS b JOIN transaction_logs AS t ON b.transaction_id = t.transaction_id WHERE b.amount < 500 ORDER BY b.amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT t.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, t.amount, t.transaction_time FROM biometric_payment_transactions AS t INNER JOIN users AS u ON t.user_id = u.user_id;

SELECT u.user_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, t.log_description, l.log_time FROM users AS u LEFT JOIN transaction_logs AS l ON u.user_id = l.transaction_id INNER JOIN biometric_payment_transactions AS t ON l.transaction_id = t.transaction_id;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, u.first_name, t.amount, l.log_description FROM biometric_payment_transactions AS t LEFT JOIN transaction_logs AS l ON t.transaction_id = l.transaction_id INNER JOIN users AS u ON t.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM biometric_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_amount FROM biometric_transactions;
SELECT user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, status FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data;
SELECT * FROM biometric_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_datetime DESC;
SELECT user_name, account_balance FROM user_accounts WHERE account_balance < 0;
SELECT transaction_id, status, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, fingerprint_data FROM biometric_data WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM biometric_transactions JOIN user_accounts ON biometric_transactions.user_id = user_accounts.user_id ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM biometric_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY expiry_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM biometric_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'j%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT transaction_id, log_id, log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_message LIKE '%error%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT users.user_id, users.username, payment_methods.card_number FROM users JOIN payment_methods ON users.user_id = payment_methods.user_id WHERE payment_methods.expiry_date > '2022-01-01';
